metadata.Plot: When a mysterious figure appears to cause a series of disruptions at the Frisbie Home in New York, word goes out to Scotland Yard that the Fuzz-Faced Phantom is at work. Soon, Charley MacNeesha and his assistant MacGregor are sent across the ocean to investigate. But even as they arrive at the home, a new series of weird events begins.
metadata.Director: Harold L. Muller, Charles R. Bowers
metadata.Writer: Charles R. Bowers, Harold L. Muller
metadata.Actors: Charles R. Bowers, Kathryn McGuire, Melbourne MacDowell
